title: Helping Others Improve Ep 18

embed.description: This is part of a series, where I try and help others go from Bronze to silver. Heck maybe even gold. Im not the one playing, Im spectating a game. If you are bronze and want some help, let me know.

body:
This guy was ham as fuck.
Watching bronze Yasuo's is sad and funny at the same time.

Either on herer or on the link, any other yasuo mains feel free to point out things that I may have missed.
As I don't play him much.

replies.body: Come at me Yas mains give me all the criticism I will handle everything you throw at me

> [{quoted}](name=Fitzky,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=fMM9vuvU,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-07-08T08:20:50.115+0000)
>
> Come at me Yas mains give me all the criticism I will handle everything you throw at me

what did you volunteer for it?

also, use highnoon in ranked, project has delays on it. Highnoon also has smoother animations
Yeah I was told that classic and high noon are better so I've stopped using project

> [{quoted}](name=Fitzky,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=fMM9vuvU,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-07-08T11:28:35.146+0000)
>
> Yeah I was told that classic and high noon are better so I've stopped using project

highnoons better than classic, only reason to use project is because its fun
Cool you wanna give me the money for it?

> [{quoted}](name=Fitzky,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=fMM9vuvU,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-07-09T00:42:49.830+0000)
>
> Cool you wanna give me the money for it?

hextech it
shoulda done a video on that tf's use of w for csing

Oh you mean like talk about it? (The vid was for Fitz not tf XD)
But I can see what you mean.
